Update :The results of the production launch of the fix are not satisfying. Our teams continue to work to improve the situation. A new fix is under development. We plan to deploy this one from Monday 31/01
Ongoing actions : Our team will put the fix in production this morning. Thank you for your understanding.

Ongoing actions : The fix is in the testing phase, if the test are successful, we will deploy the solution to restore the situation. We will come back to you soon to keep you informed about the situation. Thank you for your understanding.

Ongoing actions : Our teams had implemented a fix but it generated other errors. We proceeded to a rollback of this fix and we continue to investigate to correct the situation. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Ongoing actions : Our team is solving the root cause of the problem. Root cause : The incident is due to an error in the API code.
Start time : 24/01/2022 09:36UTC Service impact : Some customers are unable to access the panel of their dedicated servers in the manager Ongoing actions : Our technicians are currently working on

scheduled_maintenances.name: [LIM1][vRack] - Upgrade Baremetal RTvRack exchanger to version 4.23

incident_updates.body: Start time : 31/01/2022 21:00 UTC End time : 01/02/2022 02:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : In regards to our lifecycle management, we need to upgrade all RTvRack exchanger to version 4.23 in order to have a homogeneous park.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life

incident_updates.body: Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service. OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date. Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date. --------------------------------------------------- Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service. OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date. Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Start time : 27/01/2022 21:30UTC End time : 28/01/2022 00:30UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following the high temperature problems of certain modules, we decided to add another one away from the others to overcome this problem.
